sentences.english: The man surnamed Huo operated a private studio in Quanjiao county.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，男子姓霍，在全椒縣經營一傢俬人工作室。

sentences.english: From Hobyo's beach, three different ships captured by the pirates can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 從霍比亞海灘可以看到三艘被海盜攔劫的船。

sentences.english: "Are you Mrs. Rosa Sandoval?" Homer said.
sentences.chinese: “您是桑多瓦爾太太嗎？”霍默問。

sentences.english: The printed word always fascinated horace .
sentences.chinese: 書上的鉛字總使小霍勒斯着迷。

sentences.english: Cissokho's entourage are also in Milan and they are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 西索霍的隨行人員也一直米蘭，他們對此憂心忡忡。

sentences.english: Academic Responsibility Education of Mount Holyoke has remarkable characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 美國蒙特霍約克學院的學術責任教育具有鮮明特色。

sentences.english: In Houllier, Wenger is also competing against an old ally today.
sentences.chinese: 對霍利爾來說，溫格也是他多年的同胞好友兼對手。

sentences.english: I have named him. I call him Lucian Horace Ovid Virgil.
sentences.chinese: 我叫它盧西安霍里斯歐韋弗爾吉。

sentences.english: Somehow Andrew Holleman was going to stop that development.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，安德魯▪霍勒曼要阻止這項開發計劃。

sentences.english: There are 47 chimneys in the Hobbiton location.
sentences.chinese: 霍比頓所在地有47個煙囪。

sentences.english: Fadell was building an energy-efficient home near Lake Tahoe.
sentences.chinese: 法德爾曾在塔霍湖畔修建了一幢節能房屋。

sentences.english: Finally John finds the magic of Christmas and Horace discovers that miracles indeed, occur.
sentences.chinese: 最後，約翰發現了聖誕的魔力，而霍勒斯發現了奇蹟。

sentences.english: My name is Rickey Horwitz, the former owner of Practical Innovations.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是Rickey霍維茨，前主人實踐創新。

sentences.english: I was excited because I knew Houllier had done well with Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 我感到興奮，因爲我知道霍利爾在利物浦乾得很好。

sentences.english: Mr. holohan became very red and excited .
sentences.chinese: 霍羅漢變得面紅耳赤，激動極了。

sentences.english: The majority of callers asked for him to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的人現在要求解僱霍德格森。
